content: > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 1 **type ** pullover sweater **skill level ** easy **size 9 ** xs sm md lg xl 2x 3x 4x 5x based on crafty yarn council sizing with some positive ease **materials** - us j 6 00 mm crochet hook - approx 11 7 oz/ 905 yds - 23 5 oz/ 1817 yds of size #3/light worsted weight yarn notions measuring tape yarn needle the sample was made with brava sport by wecrochet affiliate link **description** the stephanie sweater is what i d like to call an early fall sweater - it s got an open and fun texture that will still be nice and light when the temps are still high this design is easy and fun with tons of room for customization and it comes in 9 sizes making it great for a variety of people no refunds on digital products you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms and tested by outside testers you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos this pattern is in pdf form and includes full color photos copyright @ divine debris 2020 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns please contact info@divinedebris com 1 https //divinedebris com/stephanie-sweater-free-crochet-pattern/
